module.name: LazPasReadUtil
module.short: Helper functions for component serialized Pascal.

descr.p: Helper functions for component serialized Pascal.
lazpasreadutil.pas is part of the lazutils package.

element.name: ExecCustomCSP
element.short: Call Instance.DefineProperties with a list of properties.

descr.p: Call Instance.DefineProperties with a list of properties in TBinaryObjectWriter format. This function is used by the auto generated Pascal of TCompWriterPas for custom DefineProperties.
